content: The concept of karma is more of a philosophical and spiritual concept rather than a scientific one. The idea of cause and effect is somewhat related to scientific understanding, but the concept of karma goes beyond that as it involves the accumulation of the results of our actions over many lifetimes. While there may not be scientific evidence to support the concept of karma, it is a significant part of many religious and philosophical systems, and it is up to each individual to decide whether they believe in it, based on their personal beliefs and experiences.
